summary.span: 為媒體內容提供 。

span.span: Provides a for media content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是物件，其提供控制媒體計時動畫時間軸物件會控制動畫的方式相同。 is a object which provides control over media timing in the same way that animation timeline objects control animations. 例如，具有相關聯的和屬性可用來指定媒體的開始時和多久播放。For example, a has associated and properties can be used to specify when media begins and how long it plays. 請參閱[動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)如動畫時間軸上的詳細資訊。See [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md) for more information on animation timelines. 有兩種方法，使至使用。There are two ways to associate a to a using a . 1. 內部，當是目標、會建立並指派給的相關聯的播放程式。Inside of a , when a is targets a , a will be created and assigned to the ’s associated player. 請參閱[How to： 使用分鏡腳本控制 MediaElement](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard.md)例如;See [How to: Control a MediaElement by Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard.md) for an example; 2. 藉由明確地建立從並將它指派給。By explicitly creating a from a and assigning it to a . 如果的設`Automatic`（預設） 的持續時間自然持續的媒體來源。If the of the is set to `Automatic` (default), the duration of is the natural duration of the media source. 若要以程式設計的方式尋找的媒體來源的自然持續期間，查詢屬性。To find the natural duration of the media source programmatically, query the property of the .
